Interface UserDefinedCS

All Superinterfaces:
Coordinate­System, Identified­Object
@UML(identifier="CS_UserDefinedCS", specification=ISO_19111) public interface UserDefinedCS extends CoordinateSystem
A two- or three-dimensional coordinate system that consists of any combination of coordinate axes not covered by any other Coordinate System type. An example is a multilinear coordinate system which contains one coordinate axis that may have any 1-D shape which has no intersections with itself. This non-straight axis is supplemented by one or two straight axes to complete a 2 or 3 dimensional coordinate system. The non-straight axis is typically incrementally straight or curved. A User­Defined­CS shall have two or three axis associations.
Since:
1.0
